title: Suspend and Resume a Transaction
description: A customer at checkout realizes they forgot an item and needs to leave the line to get it. The associate needs to suspend the transaction to help the next customer.

tasks.expected_outcome: The items are added to the transaction.

tasks.description: Use the 'Suspend Transaction' function on the POS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The current transaction is saved, and the POS is ready for a new sale. A slip with a barcode is printed to resume the transaction.

tasks.description: When the customer returns, scan the barcode on the slip to resume the transaction, add the final item, and complete the sale.
tasks.expected_outcome: The saved transaction is successfully retrieved and completed.
